评论概述: Fell Apart. Stiching on arm came out
评论详情: Love the jacket but it fell apart after a few months of light wear. Bought it in late spring and used it a bit then hung it back up till this fall then the arm started to unravel. Contacted the supplyer and the said they could not help because it had been so long. Coat looks mostly brand new other than the sleeve is falling off.  No more WenVen products for me. Seems foolish for a $54  jacket to loose a customer for and obvious flaw in manufacturing

I bought the first one in 2018, then recently saw a picture of myself and bought a new one in 2023, so I'm hoping the new one has no pocket issues. 7.5/10.

And the price is very good for this type of jacket. I would’ve expected to pay more. It’s something that my husband wears very frequently. He’s very happy with it. And I washed it and it came to the laundry perfectly. 💖

The jacket material feels strong, almost canvas type, zipper is sturdy, and the fit gives me room to move and not feel tight.

评论概述: Amazing jacket! Well played! (Insert slow clap)
评论详情: After reading other reviews about sizing down a size smaller than you normally wear, I took the leap and ordered a medium (I’m 6’2”, 198 lbs. and normally would buy a size large). The medium is perfect for me! It gives the perfect slim fitted appearance that I was looking for! The jacket looks and feels well made; the seams and stitching are tight and the lines are slick. The fabric feels like a soft cotton canvas; light but durable. Overall the jacket is lightweight but, with a very slight heft...just heavy enough to be more than a windbreaker. A great looking, sophisticated jacket...think Han Solo from The Empire Strikes Back...It has a similar vibe. It’s easily already one of my favorite jackets I’ve owned. I’ll be buying a second very soon.  I couldn’t be more pleased!

评论概述: Excellent for what I needed / Order Medium as a 'Slim Fit Large'
评论详情: I read the reviews. People said order the Medium - That it would be like a 'slim fit large'. That was the correct way to do it. The medium fits me like a slim fit large. That is what I was looking for. I know that if I got the large it would be a different type of look. I wanted something that looked cool and slimming. Medium was perfect for that. My concern was not warmth, my concern was style. (It is warm though.) This is good quality. This is a real deal for the price. I ended buying additional ones in every style, dark green and black. I have like 8 of them now. The sleeves run a bit long which for me adds to the slim fit vibe. All good.

评论概述: Great jacket once you get the wrinkles out of it
评论详情: I love this jacket!  It fits great, especially if you plan to wear it unzipped most of the time.  I'm a bit bigger around the middle than I should be (5'5" 165lbs) and it's just a bit snug if I zip it up.  It's got a good, solid feel to it with a rugged denim-type fabric on the outside.  Being a bit smaller in stature, I often struggle to find clothes that the sleeves aren't too long, and this jacket fits darned-near perfectly.As for length, the bottom hem of the jacket falls just about 4" below my belt (again, I'm 5'5" tall).My one complaint (and the reason for 4 stars instead of 5) is that it came out of the package EXTREMELY wrinkled.  I spent about an hour and fifteen minutes working to get most of the wrinkles out of it.  The collar was crumpled and it took a good deal of work and some starch to get it to straighten out... and it's still not perfect.It's a great jacket for those low-40's to mid-50s days.  It won't suffice for our long, cold Idaho winters, but come spring I'll be wearing it again.

This jacket fits good. A little snug but that's ok. I'm 5'10" & 205, chest bigger than belly, dad bod. I got a us large. Only complaint is it's a little longer than I would like. It hangs at about the middle of my butt. When zipped, it's too small around to fit around my butt so it sits above my butt which creates a slight hang or fold of material. But it's not a big deal. I would but this jacket again.
This product was horrible way to small,I asked for xl but it was more like a medium.

I’m amazed on how this jacket fits. That was my main concern; fit wise and did the job! Slim fit is all I wanted. My height is 5.8ft, weight 160lbs and normally wear S. 评论概述: Nice jacket, but PAY ATTENTION to size comments in reviews
评论详情: I wish I'd read the reviews on this before ordering.  "WenVen Men's Fall Casual Army Lightweight Jacket (Black)" AKA "WenVen Men's Fall Casual Army Warm Jacket with Pockets (Black)" is a nice jacket, but it's a little large for a large, particularly the arms are about an inch longer than I'd prefer. Typically, large jackets fit me well and I wear size medium shirts (I'm 5' 11", 190 lbs). The zipper catches a little sometimes, which I suspect is due to sharp metal edges, similar to a newly cut key, and it's a brighter gold color than the pictures suggest. Otherwise, the quality is fine. One last comment, the polyester lining is army green, which is not apparent in the pictures, but it doesn't matter to me because the lining isn't visible when wearing it.  Potentially, I'd buy this again, but it would definitely be a medium.
Good product. Well made.

评论概述: Jacket was great, for about a month
评论详情: When it arrived, there was a slight catch at one spot in the zipper. It wasn't inconvenient enough to warrant a return and replacement; I thought I could live with it.  After a month, the stitching in the pockets started coming loose. I don't put keys or anything sharp in there; the thread just started unravelling. Unfortunately, the return deadline had expired.  As time went on, the zipper is getting worse and worse. === Update: After one year and three months, the zipper has fallen apart completely. This jacket is okay if you don't mind buying a new one every few months.
